Producer: Boris Ausserer, Fred Breinersdorfer, Manfred Hattendorf, Götz Bolten
Production Co: Philipp Filmproduction, Lucky Bird Pictures, Delphi Medien, Arte
Synopsis: On Nov. 8, 1939, Georg Elser (Christian Friedel) attempts to assassinate Adolf Hitler as the dictator gives a speech in Munich.
Title: 13 Minutes
